review:
Hi, I visited Dentin clinic for persistent gum infection, root canal treatment, dental bridge and dental implant.
I highly recommend Dentin clinic as it has been my best experience so far, after receiving treatment in 5 different clinics before, including 3 in BLR.
* Appointments are quite hassle free and flexible, with minimal wait time.
* Doctors (especially Dr. Gaurav) are very understanding to the patient needs, and suggest various applicable options with pros and cons so that you can make a choice best suited to you.
* very clean, hygienic and lively environment.

I had visited for multiple issues, and the end result is absolutely satisfactory, much beyond my own expectations, with completely natural appearance of denture, and gums like they have never been healthier before. Money worth spent. No issues so far after almost a year.
Many thanks to Dr. Gaurav and his team, and Dr. Kaushik as well.

I'd bad ache in my teeth for a long time. I've consulted Dr. Gaurav for dental treatment. I had cleaning, filling and RCT done by him. He's right attitude and fine hands. My teeth and gums are absolutely fine after the treatment. I'm totally satisfied and recommend him to others.

An excellent, very hygienic and well equipped  dental clinic  Lead by Dr. Kumar Gaurav. Dr Gaurav is pleasing personality, very patient and gives good advise on dental care. I am fully satisfied with treatment and got a big relief. Highly recommended. Thank  You!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Teeth Replacement with Implants in three days,
review:
Me and my wife go 1-1 implants done

Wisdom teeth removal and one flap removed from mouth

Over all I am working with doctor to make my oral hygiene best..

Found slightly costly in terms of treatment cost but the advice was sound. Also the clinic is setup really nicely. I got cleaning done. I generally pay 1k to 1.2k. Here i paid 1.5k. They did it very well and their equipment was good so i think that extra 300-400 makes sense.

I have deducted 1 star for below reason.

He recommended a procedure instead of extraction. I am not sure if he genuinely thinks it will work or a way to make easy 2k. Though his advice might be very well right

context: Bleeding Gums Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,RCT - Single Sitting,
review: He is a very friendly jovial by nature. He explain in detail allt he treatment modalities before beginning any treatment of choice. I highly recommend to pay a visit on appointment basis.
Dr. Gaurav was very calm and understood my issues, is well experienced and handles the procedures carefully. I would highly recommend.
I have done my daughters teeth treatment *** ******* *** ****** **** **Now my daughter is not having any complain , she has two root canal done by Dentin clinic and thanks to Dr Gaurav .
